sentences.sContent: Others have shown garlic prevents platelet aggregation and reduces high blood pressure.
sentences.sContent_eng: Others have shown garlic prevents platelet aggregation and reduces high blood pressure.
sentences.sCn: 其他资料提出大蒜防止血小板凝聚，减少高血压。

sentences.sContent: Certain enzyme studies, like the white cell or platelet assay, are particularly advantageous when testing in pregnancy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Certain enzyme studies, like the white cell or platelet assay, are particularly advantageous when testing in pregnancy.
sentences.sCn: 在怀孕期间对某些酶进行检测是非常有益的，比如白细胞或血小板含量。

sentences.sContent: Thrombocytopathies comprise a poorly defined group of diseases in which platelet numbers are normal, but their function is impaired.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thrombocytopathies comprise a poorly defined group of diseases in which platelet numbers are normal, but their function is impaired.
sentences.sCn: 血小板病包括一些不好界定的疾病——血小板数量是正常的，但它们的功能受损。

trans.tranOther: one of the very small flat round cells in your blood that help it become solid when you bleed, so that you stop bleeding
